title: Kahlua Soaked Raisin Cookies
ingredients: ['225g raisins', '125ml coffee flavoured liqueur, such as Kahlua', '200g margarine', '440g dark brown soft sugar', '3 eggs', '125ml milk', '375g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '200g porridge oats', '115g chopped walnuts (optional)', '170g white chocolate chips (optional)']
